Kwame Akoto-Bamfo bụ onye Ghana na-akpụ ihe

Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya n'èzí bụ nke a raara nye maka ncheta nke ndị ihe metụtara n'ahia ohu Transatlantic bụ nke a na-egosi na National Memorial for Peace and Justice nke mepere na 2018 na Montgomery, Alabama. Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere ntinye nke isi konkiri otu puku na narị abụọ na-anọchite anya ndị nna nna Ghana na-agba ohu na Accra, isi obodo Ghana
A na-akpọ ya Faux-Reedom, e kpughere ya na 2017.
